name: Wishing Wings
description:
Made by 6 talented developers during the CGX Grad Jam, explore a cave as a bat, collecting magical keys for a genie!

Team

Alfredo Debasa Cabrera - Lead Programmer

Josh Sankarlal - Sound and Animation Programmer

Katia Kautz - Character Artist

Sue Yang - Environmental Artist

Junior Gonçlaves - Sound Effects Composer

Michael Macapagal - Music Composer
